price: ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߓߍ߲߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߤߌߣߊߒߕߋ ߡߊ߬ ߥߍ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߟߏߞߍ߫ ߘߋ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
